title: Joy
text: At first, I was kinda unsure of how Temu and buying the products turn out but so far everything I bought from them has been great. I love you guys keep up the great work looking forward to spending more of my money which guys and buying other things I have in my cart because the first two orders were kind of like test runs for me to see how it would come out since a lot of people show boxes being a damage and stuff. Everything that bought came perfect no damages or anything like that. My head was shipping but of course I had to keep in mind it was Christmas time and not to worry about it, so I‚Äôm thinking things will be better after Christmas and stuff like that but it was so thank you very much

title: Over all quality and service.
text: I was skeptical when I found team you, but I did go ahead and make an order, and was very pleased with how quick it came usually within about 10 days and the quality of which the things were was impressive. The only suggestion I would make is to pay very close attention to the details as in size measurements, and make sure that you check on the clothes which are good quality good fabric, great designs as pictured when they show them because each items measurements are a little bit different so you may need to go up a size or down to size, but the quality is awesome, I will keep ordering from Temu because I am very pleased with their products .

title: Online is maybe ok. But app is a scam
text:
My dad buys stuff from Temu online and has no problems. But I see stuff online and on Pinterest all the time that I want to look at. When you click the link, you can‚Äôt look or buy it unless you down load the app. 

When you down load the app you still can‚Äôt see it unless you ‚Äútry for a discount‚Äù by spinning the wheel. If you try to bypass it. Is still spins the wheel. Now you are stuck in a circle of discounts that you didn‚Äôt ask for and can‚Äôt get out of. WHEN ALL I WANT TO DO IS LOOK AT THE DESCRIPTION!!!

I have also gotten friend requests. ‚ÄúDownload load this app and help me get a free item‚Äù It does look cool, so you try it out. But now you are AGAIN stuck in a circle of ‚Äúhere is a great price‚Äù, but only if you invite a friend. Then, ‚Äúyou‚Äôre so close, now invite another friend‚Äù etc. AND YOU CAN‚ÄôT BYPASS IT!!!  (So now they have gotten free advertising, you are frustrated AND have gotten nothing, and you have bothered several friends)

title: Great experiences so far.
text:
I definitely take into account that a lot of products on Temu are not super high quality and the ones that are charge like they are. I have only been disappointed in a couple products but some of my purchases where surprisingly excellent. That‚Äôs what brings me back. The little things that make organizing my home effectively without the big price tags. I definitely compare to other companies and make a conscious decision about the quality risks and for the most part I have not been disappointed. Customer Service is responsive that was a total pleasant surprise.

One of my favorite things is finding stuff you have seen and wonder where you can get it Temu answers that question.

title: Love this website
text:
I can‚Äôt tell you enough how I absolutely am in love with this site. Everything that I‚Äôve gotten or purchased has been of great quality, they always have such great deals and coupons you can use. This is definitely not a scam site. The shipping is awesome and they always ship on time, but if for some reason it‚Äôs late you get a 5$ credit which is nice to be honest. 
The only thing I wish they had was a wishlist or a heart where we can click to find the item again or be able to save it to a wishlist. That would make things easier for me. Things do sell out fast, but this is a awesome site to buy things and they have so many categories to choose from. I‚Äôm on my like 7th order lol. üíñüíñüíñ I love Temu!

title: Purchases
text: I‚Äôve been ordering from them regularly And the products are really good. Great the dresses are made of good material. They fit properly. The make up was wonderful. Saved me a fortune. I did have a problem with my last delivery it was not delivered by ups which I prefer and it ended up in New York for three days when I received it it was all ripped up, but thankfully only  one dress  was damaged..everything else fit grade, and they even gave me my money back.. this place is great to work with.  Excellent customer service, which is extremely important when you‚Äôre purchasing online‚Ä¶ I will definitely continue buying .. I just wish they would stick with UPS   I just got three more items  can‚Äôt wait to receive !!!

title: Very helpful app
text: At first I was iffy about using this app because it does look sketchy. BUT, not long after using it I was able to get into the games and share to so many people (ones who also thought this app was a scam) Not long after, I started receiving credits for sharing to new users and I was able to get a lot of things for free using the credit offers they have. The app has very good coupons that come in handy that you can even use with your credits. The only problem I have with it is how long things take to come in, I did order a lot of things so that can be a reason why it takes over a few weeks. But one order I just made a week ago came in today and it‚Äôs all great quality.

title: Usually don‚Äôt give review, but this time I must
text: At first I was skeptical of this app, didn‚Äôt know if this was legit or a scam. But I ordered Lenovo thinkpluse headphones and they arrived on time good condition and quality. I also got a huge discount on that headphone. I am traveling abroad to meet my relatives, so I thought I could some wireless earbuds for my cousins, but the app said that the demand for those products was high and this could delay the shipping. I was worried because I needed those earbuds before the day of my departure. Temu gave $5 cash on the app and apology for shipping it out late. But here is the good part the earbuds were not delayed not even that it arrived two days earlier than estimated date initially given at the time of purchase. That is why I think Temu deserves 5 stars.

title: Temu is the place to go!
text: I absolutely love Temu! I have been satisfied with all my purchases. They even gave me $5 credit when one order didn‚Äôt arrive in time üòÅ There is soooo much you can buy in this site. They have been good at settling any issues I might have which isn‚Äôt but one or two times but they fixed issue immediately. I‚Äôm so glad to have found them lol I also like the games where you can earn free items which I have also received üòÅüòÅIf I was to change something about Temu it would only be that they ship everything in boxes and not bags. You do get damaged packaging at times. Item is intact though so no use complaining if you ask me lol Otherwise I really enjoy Temu and all that they offer.

title: Sketchy and Unreal
text:
After ive gotten a few packages late at night I've gotten random foreign charges and my packages came in a poorly packed bag with it looking like as if the person who sent it to me didn't even try to package it. Not only that but after Ive deleted my card off of the app theres been no foreign transactions at all. (Keep in mind these transactions were over 200 dollars). 

Ive also been seeing on social media and me being curious that this app is actually rated a customer rating of less than 1.5 stars by the BBB. People have been previously also commenting on the fact that they aren't getting their stuff when they are supposed to and they are also reporting mysterious charges. And some people have also gotten unresponsive customer service. Its also said that when TIME contacted the company, they did not directly address questions about the customer complaints and none of the concerns from BBB. Please look through these reviews!!!

title: Gettin‚Äô Scammy
text: So the longer I use this app the more scammed me and gets for example in the farmland game it barely gives you any access to water him and makes that water near worthless so that it can take you forever to finish around and get your ‚Äúfree item‚Äú in the fish win game it has many times win if you click the close the window for its many little pop-ups that it doesn‚Äôt close the window it just opens yet another there are times whenever you can‚Äôt close the windows because the close exes are disabled there are even times when it will demand that you give it someone‚Äôs email address And it will not let you continue to play fish land until you give it an email address and it will lock the thing up and you have to exit out physically close the app and then reopen to continue what you were doing as well as all of the fake other player competitions that it wants you to play. Overall AliExpress is better.

title: Annoying.
text: Y‚Äôall need to stop with all the pop ups and animations. I help my friend out by clicking on her links and omg are all those pop ups and animations so annoying. üôÑ and the times I have actually tried to get the ‚Äúgifts‚Äù, y‚Äôall will start to make it harder and harder each time where you have to desperately try to find new users or just give up. Absolutely ridiculous. And a lot of things are way too overpriced. Reminds me of what shein did, where things were reasonably priced (but still terrible quality) and then they kept raising the prices over time (still terrible quality). It‚Äôs the audacity for me. I‚Äôm not happy about my fluffy blanket that sheds more than my dog and cat combined. Thanks so much reviewers.

title: Great place to shop
text: This company had some bad reviews when I searched prior to using it. I decided to give them a try and I have been extremely satisfied. The customer service is outstanding. I have zero negative comments to say about their services. If you need to return an item their is no backlash given. I have been very satisfied with 98% of my purchases . The other 2% was refunded back to my account immediately. You absolutely can‚Äôt beat the price. Again I have been extremely satisfied and the quality is great. I have placed numerous orders with them over time. I had one order that was late arriving and they updated me and have me a 5 dollar credit. All packages have arrived without delay excluding the one.

title: Awesome.
text: I‚Äôm so glad that I was told about this site. Very addictive though. I‚Äôve ordered a ton of things. Sometimes it take a little longer than I‚Äôd like to get here. But they still get here.  I haven‚Äôt had any issues with returns or getting credit back. I just don‚Äôt care for the games. Takes to long. To many shares have to be done. I‚Äôll keep sharing and telling people as well.

title: I have good and bad comments
text:
The process of buying is relatively good, it‚Äôs very, VERY annoying that I‚Äôm checking a product, and over the picture I need too see, there are always those strips that tell you how many people are checking certain products, or who bought them, so the pictures are partially block, and that‚Äôs so bad when they cover information in the picture I need to see/read First, I don‚Äôt care, second they are annoying. So my problem is with the design of the app, that‚Äôs so useless, and just makes me log out, every time. 

Now my experience with shoppings has been good. Things are mostly cheaply made, so you need to decide what articles of your household don‚Äôt need a great quality, in some items I received they were nothing like the pictures, though you get some surprises, specially in clothing items, the issue is, I use to follow the size chart, and get clothing that were two sizes bigger than my actual size, now I follow the size I‚Äôm here.

The packaging for me gets 3 stars 
I know plastic can be cheaper but there has been some products that arrived broken, the refund process  is quite simple though, but you feel like you got stuff to immediately turn it into trash. So by saving in packaging they spend in refunds.

title: It‚Äôs like the Dollar Tree of online shopping
text:
I‚Äôm literally browsing the app everyday for hours just adding crap to my wishlist that I plan to buy. There are so many incredibly practical things on there that I didn‚Äôt even know existed, sure other sites my have them too, but Temu makes the obscure and unusual take center stage. 

Oh you say they‚Äôre stealing my information and selling it it the Chinese government? Interesting, my government steals my data all the time and I get nothing, but China is giving me merchandise that would cost me quadruple elsewhere? Well, at least I‚Äôm making the profit now. The corporations have been taking advantage of china for decades, now the average American consumer gets the chance to have a piece of the pie.

Five stars!

title: Very addicting
text: I love this app and have purchased so many things already and have no intention of stopping and I am obsessed and addicted. Great quality of items at great prices. However, their promotions to get free items are impossible to complete without hundreds of friends to become new users. I did complete one and received my free items so it is possible. The problem is once all your friends become users they no longer qualify so when you go to do it again, it‚Äôs impossible. They do have others that you can feed fish or water plants but it becomes increasingly harder to complete the closer you get. I don‚Äôt think there is a way to actually complete these promos and it‚Äôs misleading. For someone who has purchased as many times as I have, I should get something free.

title: Do your research
text:
There are many products on Temu that are great, and have better quality than a Walmart special for an amazing price. Seems very similar to AliExpress, but with better tracking and shorter shipping times generally. That said, be sure to make sure you do some research into what you‚Äôre getting to understand the product and it‚Äôs value before purchase.

Temu loves to incorporate ‚Äúgames‚Äù that make you feel like you can easily get some free prizes; which is not true. If you feel inclined, check the Reddit to see many posts of people trying to swap clicks for help. I‚Äôve never been successful, though some could be? Use it for what it is and try to stay away otherwise. I‚Äôve no complaints with my purchases and don‚Äôt feel scammed in anyway following those ideas.

title: Package not delivered and been sent back why? No access/no safe location?
text: Temu is user friendly and has various selection of products. However, the carrier they choose is the wrost carrier I‚Äôve ever seen. They won‚Äôt try to deliver it again even though they knew the address is correct. So disappointed about Temu. Now half of the items I ordered are out of stock. But I guess their reps are overworked, so that 12 hours later still no one reached out to me.

title: This app is a scam!
text: This app is obviously a scam, if you look at the reviews on the app you can see that the same exact review is written multiply times, also some bad reviews on it still have good ratings, how is that possible, my sister was trying to get the free stuff, and she sent it to a lot of people, and once it got to three dollars left, it started only taking away one cent. This app is obviously a scam and tries to steal all of your information. If you look at the reviews on items in the app, you can see that it‚Äôs only positive reviews, and if you try hard to find all of the reviews, you can find some negative reviews, I am pretty sure that all of the people getting ‚Äúfree items‚Äù or getting them in ‚Äúperfect shape‚Äù are fake people, I looked at the people names and they seemed pretty fake, and it doesn‚Äôt even show the entire name. I don‚Äôt know if my real rating will show but it is definitely one star. I am very angry with this app doing illegal things.

title: Great Companies
text: I heard mixed reviews from folks. Some said it‚Äôs a scam, others have said they never received their items. I have ordered over 20 times from TEMU, and I have never had an issue with receiving the items I ordered!  In fact, I didn‚Äôt receive several items by the promised date, and when I contacted the company, I was reimbursed within about 2 minutes. Not only was I reimbursed, the company told me to keep the items if they were delivered. Additionally, I was credited with $5 because the items didn‚Äôt arrive on time. BTW, I received the items a week later. TEMU rocks. It just takes anywhere from 7-10 to receive your order, but for the huge savings, I can wait a week and a half.

title: My experience on Temu
text: When I first heard about the app I didn‚Äôt really think it would be anything like to crazy but after I downloaded it I saw some crazy cheap things and added them to my cart. And when I bought them I wasn‚Äôt really to sure what the quality would be like and didn‚Äôt know if I was going to get scammed (but if I did it was still very cheap and wasn‚Äôt to big of a deal) but I was very surprised after I got my items because the were good sizes, quality and were very useful so I was very glad with my experience on Temu and encourage you to use the app if you want some cheap, good quality things. But not only were there some good things on Temu there were also good dupes that are really nice.ü§©

title: Gotta find the good products that are hidden within the app!
text: If you can find the good products hidden throughout the app, this isn‚Äôt a bad little app. Some of the products are cheaply made but Temu does a good job at refunding people for their money if something was wrong with a product or the issuer's description of the product was different then the actual product you received. There‚Äôs also a lot of well made and great deals for good money on this app too but like I said you just have to find them and definitely try to read the reviews. I‚Äôm a huge review reader and that‚Äôs how I decide if I should take a chance on buying something. For the most part this apps not bad because of the prices on it and how Temu is about helping you with an issue may one arise.

title: Sucked into the app
text: I was suspicious at first but now I‚Äôm sucked into the app.  I‚Äôve not been disappointed in any of the several purchases I‚Äôve made so far.  As I say ‚Äúyou get what you pay for‚Äù.  Some purchases have been exactly what I expected for the price, but most have far exceeded my expectations of quality for the price.  I will continue to use this app, buying every day things that I would normally buy from Walmart or Target.  Same or better quality, but much much cheaper.  If you don‚Äôt mind that it can take 7-10 days to receive the order, it‚Äôs awesome!  So far I estimate that I‚Äôve saved a couple hundredof dollars on items that I needed and would have just grabbed at my local box store shopping centers.

title: Poor customer service
text:
Folks, if you need items to be refunded, never use your card to be credited. They are so quick to issue refund receipt but nobody actually releases credit back to your card. After almost 2months, I did not get my refund, reached out to them & the agents? SMH. They dont know what they're doing. If you'd ask them what a color of an object is, they would answer you with a number. That's how I felt when I was asking them for a refund of an organizer & their agent talked about a phone holder. I CANT! ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èThey cant give you a concrete answer & would redirect you to other people who have no clue what's going on & I hate repeating myself over & over & not get an answer why they cant fix the issue.
I am so frustrated hence this review. If I cohld give them a zero, I would. & 100% I assure everyone none of Temu would take
action despite this review. So folks, dont waste your time installing this app nor your money to spend anything on them.

title: I love Temu
text: I was doubtful about this site. So my first order was small. I bought different things to test the quality of Temu products. So far I am happy with almost all of my purchases. The clothing, the materials are terrific. Shoes, amazing. Nail tech stuff, great. I highly recommend this site if you want cute clothing, shoes etc at an affordable price. Even the blankets are of good quality. They have awesome and affordable prices. The site has everything you can think of. Shipping is under 2 weeks from pay time to delivery time. I highly recommend this site for any and everyone who likes to shop but can‚Äôt afford to with everything so expensive now days. Trust me, Temu is affordable and worth the prices. Very low affordable prices

title: Great quality at really low prices.
text:
So I decided to give this a shot. Placed an order for a bunch of things (clothing & electronics) for like $120usd and retuned about $80usd. The returns were due to product quality, it was simply size and ‚Äòno longer needed‚Äô reasons. The return was as easy as any major online clothing retailer. The quality was much better than what I expected given the prices of the items. The stitchings and details may have been done with a sowing machine, however there still has to be someone to work the sowing machine. Given the price and quality of the items I do find myself wondering how much the individual that made it gets compensated.

That being said I did place another order.

title: TEMU is the right place to shop.
text:
I ordered a variety of clothing, women boots, and a sofa recliner cover.  Out of everything ordered only one thing was too big and this was a first over the years.  I would buy mediums at other stores and they would be too small.  I ordered him a large hoodie sweatshirt and the sleeves hung way past his hands and the shirt went to his knees.  So we ordered a medium but had to get a different color.
Customer Service is awesome and they want you very satisfied.
The return policy is hassle free.  I stayed away from Temu because of the gossip that the products are not the same online and what they send.  Well that was a lie.   Everything I ordered matched the online pictures.  The boots are awesome and a great bargain.

title: This is such a good app it is addicting.
text:
Read it all please! 
First off. No scams. Everything is suuuuper cheap. And you get what you see. There is brand name things on this app for incredible prices. And I expected the things I ordered to be fake or bad quality due to the price‚Ä¶ BUT THEY ARE EXACTLY THE OPPOSITE. Everything I have bought from here has came in just like they were described and shown as. I have ordered multiple times and been astonished every time. It doesn‚Äôt send too many notifications either. Things always come in faster than they say so that is nice! I highly recommend it. They have all sorts of items. From all ends of the spectrum everything you could imagine. Only disclaimer is that it is addicting!

title: Good shopping place
text: I love shopping probably to much. They have so many thing on this site sometimes it‚Äôs hard to choose. Just look around because it‚Äôs like a flea market with many many small stores , but selling new stuff not used. Most use the same templates for what they are selling. Some have better descriptions then other and some better prices. So do your homework. The only thing that bothers me is everything you buy is put in a orange plastic bag with no packing. The color is fine it‚Äôs the packing. I have received 1 or 2 damaged things and a couple were opened and items out in the bag. title: 1 Star due to requiring e-mail to go to products page
text:
A friend showed me this site last night and we were scrolling through checking out all kinds of things while she was purchasing. Today I decided to download the app myself. Once I download it I tapped on about four items to get a better look at the products. On the fifth item the app required me to sign up for emails otherwise I was not able to look at any more products, only the main page that you scroll through that shows everything. Even if I go through and turn off all the notifications and block the emails after I sign up JUST SO I CAN LOOK at items there‚Äôs no guarantee that this company isn‚Äôt going to sell my email to others. I am already dealing with blocking multiple emails from another company who sold my email addy three months ago and who doesn‚Äôt seem to understand what Unsubscribe means.

 I‚Äôm deleting the app because of this.

title: Not happy

title: Awesome place to shop
text: I was looking for some one piece collectables and some clothes. The range of things I found was unbelievable. If you want something just type it in the search bar and you will, more times then not, find it or something close to it. A lot of my friends told me this was a scam so I was hesitant at first but I can assure you this is not a scam app or website. The delivery was fast to considering it was coming from overseas. They have multiple ways of paying, ApplePay, Klarna (buy now pay over 4 payments every 2 weeks, Afterpay ( basically the same as Klarna), debit or credit. They offer discounts and very good prices so you save even more. If you are looking for a shopping app this is the way to go.
